verses.text: Hallelujah. Happy \w are|strong="H3068"\w* those \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w greatly|strong="H3966"\w* \w delight|strong="H2654"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*.

\w Mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \w on|strong="H1961"\w* earth \w shall|strong="H2233"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w their|strong="H1961"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*; \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w blessing|strong="H1288"\w* \w shall|strong="H2233"\w* \w rest|strong="H1961"\w* \w on|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1288"\w* \w race|strong="H2233"\w* \w of|strong="H2233"\w* \w the|strong="H1288"\w* \w upright|strong="H3477"\w*.

\w Wealth|strong="H1952"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w riches|strong="H6239"\w* \w are|strong="H1004"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w their|strong="H5975"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*, \w their|strong="H5975"\w* prosperity \w stands|strong="H5975"\w* \w forever|strong="H5703"\w*.

\w To|strong="H6662"\w* \w the|strong="H3477"\w* \w upright|strong="H3477"\w* \w arises|strong="H2224"\w* light \w in|strong="H3477"\w* \w the|strong="H3477"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*; full \w of|strong="H6662"\w* favor \w and|strong="H2587"\w* pity \w and|strong="H2587"\w* kindness \w are|strong="H6662"\w* \w they|strong="H2822"\w*.

\w It|strong="H4941"\w* \w is|strong="H1697"\w* \w well|strong="H2896"\w* \w with|strong="H1697"\w* those \w who|strong="H2896"\w* \w show|strong="H2603"\w* \w pity|strong="H2603"\w* \w and|strong="H4941"\w* \w lend|strong="H3867"\w*, \w who|strong="H2896"\w* support \w all|strong="H1697"\w* their \w affairs|strong="H1697"\w* \w upon|strong="H4941"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w shaken|strong="H4131"\w*; \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w just|strong="H6662"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w forever|strong="H5769"\w* \w remembered|strong="H2143"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w tidings|strong="H8052"\w*, \w with|strong="H3068"\w* steady \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* trust \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

\w Their|strong="H5564"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w firm|strong="H7200"\w* \w and|strong="H7200"\w* unafraid: \w they|strong="H3808"\w* know \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* feast \w their|strong="H5564"\w* eyes \w on|strong="H7200"\w* \w their|strong="H5564"\w* \w enemies|strong="H6862"\w*.

\w With|strong="H7161"\w* lavish hands \w they|strong="H5975"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* poor, \w and|strong="H5975"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* prosperity \w stands|strong="H5975"\w* \w forever|strong="H5703"\w*. \w They|strong="H5975"\w* \w are|strong="H5975"\w* \w lifted|strong="H7311"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w heights|strong="H7311"\w* \w of|strong="H7161"\w* triumph \w and|strong="H5975"\w* \w honor|strong="H3519"\w*.

\w The|strong="H7200"\w* \w sight|strong="H7200"\w* \w of|strong="H7200"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w* fills \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w with|strong="H3707"\w* \w anger|strong="H3707"\w*: grinding \w their|strong="H7200"\w* \w teeth|strong="H8127"\w* \w with|strong="H3707"\w* despair. \w The|strong="H7200"\w* hopes \w of|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w will|strong="H7563"\w* come \w to|strong="H7200"\w* nothing.
